feed.title: Muhammad Adel
feed.subtitle: Welcome to my blog, where I dive deep into the world of cybersecurity with detailed guides, tutorials, and insights. Here, you'll find comprehensive writeups on various cybersecurity challenges, red teaming techniques, and general security practices. Whether you're an experienced professional or just starting out, my content is designed to provide valuable knowledge and practical advice to help you navigate and excel in the ever-evolving field of cybersecurity. Join me in exploring and mastering the latest in security and threat management.

entry.title: MobileHackingLab IOS Challenges Writeups
entry.summary: Introduction Peace be upon all of you. In this post, I am going to share writeups for some of the IOS Challenges of the free MobileHackingLab IOS Application Security course. Course Link: https://www.mobilehackinglab.com/course/free-ios-application-security-course Challenges Link: https://www.mobilehackinglab.com/free-mobile-hacking-labs FlipCoin Wallet Description The challenge is c...

entry.title: HexTree Attack Surface Android App Solutions

link.title: HexTree Attack Surface Android App Solutions

entry.summary: Introduction Peace be upon all of you. In this post I am going to share all the solutions for the Attack Surface Android app, which is part of the amazing Hextree Android Application Security course. This app is packed with hands-on challenges to practice many real-world Android vulnerabilities. Course Link: https://app.hextree.io/map/android Intents Attacks Flag1 Basic exported activ...

entry.title: Walkthrough of The InsecureShop Android Vulnerable Application

link.title: Walkthrough of The InsecureShop Android Vulnerable Application

entry.summary: Introduction InsecureShop is an Android application that is designed to be intentionally vulnerable. The application serves as a platform to test your Android pentesting skills. The vulnerabilities present in this app are real and have been found during mobile pentests. Peace be upon all of you, on this writeup I am going to cover all the solutions for all the InsecureShop challenges. Each ...

entry.title: Breaking the Vault | A Detailed Walkthrough of The RedTeam Capstone Challenge

link.title: Breaking the Vault | A Detailed Walkthrough of The RedTeam Capstone Challenge

entry.summary: TryHackMe’s RedTeam Capstone Challenge provides an unparalleled, hands-on experience that simulates real-world hacking scenarios. This challenge tests your skills in network infiltration, vulnerability exploitation, and navigating complex defenses. Peace be upon all of you, In this writeup, I won’t just be sharing the direct solutions. Instead, I’ll take you on a journey through my own experi...

entry.title: BlackHatMEA Qualifications 2022 CTF Web Challenges Writeup

link.title: BlackHatMEA Qualifications 2022 CTF Web Challenges Writeup

entry.summary: Peace be upon all of you, on this writeup I am going to cover the solutions of some web challenges from BlackHatMEA CTF. We have participated under the team 0xCha0s. Jimmy’s Blog Difficulty: Hard Description: The technology is always evolving, so why do we still stick with password-based authentication? That makes no sense! That’s why I designed my own password-less login system. I even open...
